title: Gauley River National Recreation Area: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park        Gauley River           News Keep informed about what is going on in your park. Check the News page for news events and press releases.         Photos and More Experience the park through photo galleries and videos. Visit the Photos and Multimedia page         History and Culture Learn about the people, places and stories that create a rich cultural history of Gauley River. Visit the History and Culture page.          Nature The Gauley River and New River Gorge area are some of the most biologically diverse river gorges in the Appalachian Mountains. Learn more about the animals, plants, ecosystems, natural features, and environmental factors that shape life in this area; Visit the Nature page.           Kids and Youth Learn more about programs for kids. Become a Junior Ranger or participate in our Rangers in Training or Youth Arts in the Parks programs. Visit the Kids and Youth page.           Management Find information about park staff, management and planning, and laws and policies on our Management page.
